languages.text: {n}Махарий не обращает внимания на подошедшего сына, но полные недоверия и сомнения взгляды младших членов семейства Зауэрбэк едва ли не приколачивают юношу к полу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Махарий не обращает внимания на подошедшего сына, но полные недоверия и сомнения взгляды младших членов семейства Зауэрбек едва ли не приколачивают юношу к полу.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий не обращает внимания на подошедшего сына, но полные недоверия и сомнения взгляды младших членов семейства Зауэрбэк едва ли не приколачивают юношу к полу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharias does not notice his son approaching him, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, full of distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは息子に目もくれず、集団に戻るが、ザウアーバック家の若者たちが不信と疑惑にイラ立ちながら向けるギラついた視線に、青年は倒れそうにる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは息子に目もくれず、集団に戻るが、ザウアーバック家の若者たちが不信と疑惑にイラ立ちながら向けるギラついた視線に、青年は倒れそうにる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯没有注意到儿子正向自己走来。在他身边，苏尔贝克家族的年轻人都以怀疑的目光盯着赫特卡，几乎要将他压垮在地。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯没有注意到儿子正向自己走来。在他身边，苏尔贝克家族的年轻人都以怀疑的目光盯着赫特卡，几乎要将他压垮在地。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Contrairement à Macharius, qui ne semble même pas se rendre compte que son fils l'a rejoint, les autres membres de la famille Sauerback le suivent des yeux avec l'air suspicieux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Contrairement à Macharius, qui ne semble même pas se rendre compte que son fils l'a rejoint, les autres membres de la famille le suivent des yeux avec l'air suspicieux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius no presta atención a su hijo cuando se reúne con el grupo, pero las miradas de los miembros más jóvenes de la familia Sauerback, llenas de desconfianza, casi dejan paralizado al joven.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius no se da cuenta de que su hijo se le acerca, pero las miradas de los miembros más jóvenes de la familia Sauerback, llenas de desconfianza, intimidan al joven.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius beachtet seinen Sohn nicht, als dieser sich wieder zu der Gruppe gesellt. Doch die Blicke der jüngeren Mitglieder der Familie Sauerback, voller Misstrauen und Zweifel, nageln den jungen Mann fast am Boden fest.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius bemerkt nicht, dass sein Sohn sich nähert, doch die Blicke der jüngeren Mitglieder der Familie Sauerback, voller Misstrauen und Zweifel, nageln den jungen Mann fest am Boden fest.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macharius, oğlunun aralarına katılmasına hiç aldırış etmiyor. Sauerback Hanesi'nin genç mensupları ise itimatsız ve şüpheci bakışlarla delikanlıyı âdeta yerin dibine sokuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius pays no attention to his son as he rejoins the group, but the glares of the younger Sauerback family members, bristling with distrust and doubt, almost pin the young man to the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius, oğlunun aralarına katılmasına hiç aldırış etmiyor. Ancak Sauerback Hanesi'nin genç mensupları, itimatsız ve şüphe duyan bakışlarla delikanlıyı âdeta yerin dibine sokuyor.{/n}
